DOC.brief_summary: GlaxoSmithKline conduct trial compare analgesic efficacy paracetamol 1000 mg vs 650 mg . The post-surgical dental pain model use evaluate analgesic efficacy paracetamol . Each subject enrol study six week . The duration entire study approximately 18 week . Each subject come clinic three visit ( Screening , Treatment Follow visit ) .
DOC.brief_title: Post-operative Dental Pain Study Comparing Two Different Dosage Analgesic Efficacy
DOC.criteria: Subjects age 18 45 year moderatetosevere dental pain assess verbal rating scale ( VRS ) confirm score least 50 mm 100 mm use visual analogue ( VAS ) follow surgical removal two mandibular third molar . If one mandibular third molar remove , must full bony impaction . If two mandibular third molar remove , may partial bony impaction OR may combination one full bony impaction second tooth erupt , soft tissue impaction , partial bony impaction . Ipsilateral maxillary third molar may remove surgeon 's discretion , regardless impaction level .
